{{Cleanup|date=December 2008}} {{Infobox video game |title = Traffic Giant |image = [[Image:Traffic Giant.png|200px|Cover art]] |caption = ''Traffic Giant'' cover art |developer = [[JoWood Productions]] |publisher = [[JoWood Productions]]

[[Real-time strategy game|Strategy]] |modes = [[Single-player video game|Single-player]]
[[multiplayer video game|multiplayer]] |ratings = {{vgratings|ESRB=Everyone (E)}} |platforms = [[Personal Computer|PC]] ([[Microsoft Windows|Windows]]) |media = [[CD-ROM]] |requirements = |input = [[Computer mouse|Mouse]]
[[Computer keyboard|Keyboard]] }} '''''Traffic Giant''''' is a [[computer game]] released in 2001[http://www.gamefaqs.com/pc/471510-traffic-giant/data GameFAQs- Traffic Giant] by [[Austria]]n [[software]] [[company (law)|company]] [[JoWood Productions]]. It allows players to create a working public transportation system in a city[http://www.jowood.com/?lang=en&site=2&gameid=trafficgiant "JoWooD Entertainment AG- News"] using [[buses]], [[streetcars]], [[commuter rail]], [[Monorail|suspended monorail]] (much like the [[Schwebebahn Wuppertal]]), and [[Maglev train]]s.{{Citation needed|date=August 2010}} The game used 2-D [[Isometric projection|isometric]] graphics for its interface, much like many tycoon-style games of the time. ==See also== * [[Cities in Motion]] * [[Transport Tycoon]] ==References== ==External links== *[http://www.jowood.com/?lang=en&site=2&gameid=trafficgiant Official page at JoWooD.com] *[http://www.verkehrsgigant.de Official German homepage] *[http://www.gamefaqs.com/computer/doswin/data/471510.html GameFAQs] *{{moby game|id=/traffic-giant|name=''Traffic Giant''}} [[Category:Windows games]] [[Category:2001 video games]] [[Category:Video games with isometric graphics]] [[Category:Business simulation games]] [[Category:JoWooD Entertainment games]] [[Category:Transport simulation games]] {{simulation-videogame-stub}} [[de:Der Verkehrsgigant]] [[fr:Traffic Giant]] [[hu:Traffic Giant]] [[nl:Traffic Giant]] [[ja:ãã©ãã£ãã¯ã¸ã£ã¤ã¢ã³ã]] [[pl:Traffic Giant]]
